titles.title: Recognizing August 6, National Night Out, the national coming together of Americans all over the Nation to unite and promote public safety.
Recognizing August 6, National Night Out, the national coming together of Americans all over the Nation to unite and promote public safety.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution encourages law enforcement departments to use the National Night Out as an opportunity to improve relationships with the communities they serve.
